title: Peach Cobbler
ingredients: 3 fresh peaches, peeled, pitted, and sliced
instructions: 1. Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 10x10-inch baking dish. 2. Stir together peaches, 1 1/2 cups sugar, and cinnamon in a medium bowl until well combined; set aside. 3. Beat together remaining 1 cup sugar and shortening in a large bowl until light and fluffy. Stir together flour, baking powder, and salt in a small bowl; add to shortening mixture alternately with milk, mixing after each addition until just combined. 4. Pour biscuit batter into the prepared baking dish; top with peach mixture. Drop butter in boiling water and pour all over peaches. 5. Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 40 to 45 minutes.
